urls.title: Work starts on River Tyne eel pass and fish counter improvements
urls.description: The Environment Agency is working with Northumbrian Water to open up the River Tyne to migrating eels, as well as carrying out a fish counter refurbishment.

text:
Work is due to start on a new eel pass and fish counter refurbishment on the River Tyne at Riding Mill. 

The work with @NorthumbrianH2O opens up the river to migrating eels and helps protect, improve and develop fish stocks.

Read more: https://t.co/VE3oGlAOrc https://t.co/YF6SjLScDD
